Subject: Predefined Content
Description: I just selected pre-defined content for phone number, I changed it to Report, and then to Block &  Report, and it doesnt block phone numbers or show in logs anymore. it used to work, then i added contextual list, but now i removed it, and it doesnt work anymore, how can i fix this to block phone number
What_We_Know__c:
4/18/2025

- Customer having issues after adding/removing contextual detection on a policy that blocks telephone numbers

- After removal, customer's policy fails to block telephone numbers and produce reports

- Customer created another policy that blocks telephone numbers and produces reports

- Customer later self resolved issue by turning off/on policy experiencing issue and allowing EPP time to update policy

- Customer has requested to close case
Solution_Comment__c: - Customer self resolved issue by turning off/on policy experiencing issue and allowing EPP time to update policy
